alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otsego, northwestern Delaware and southeastern Chenango Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Unadilla, or 15 miles southeast of Norwich, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Sidney, Delhi, Meredith, Masonville, Unadilla, Otego, Franklin, West End and Sidney Center. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 9 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
